s2.ptxt: Place the seat in the cabin.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.

s2.ptxt: Connect the connector under the seat.
Install the seat with the 4 bolts.

atten4.ptxt: Tighten the bolts in the order indicated in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT AND ADJUST SEAT SLIDE ADJUSTER LOCKS

s2.ptxt: During sliding operation of the front seat, check that the left and right adjusters move together smoothly and lock simultaneously.
If the seat adjusters do not lock simultaneously, loosen the seat fixation bolts to adjust the adjuster's position.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEAT TRACK BRACKET COVER OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Install the bracket cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration and attach the 2 claws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SEAT TRACK BRACKET INNER COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Install the bracket cover in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration and attach the 2 claws.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten3.ptxt: Certain systems need to be initialized after disconnecting and reconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal.
